mapper.select: SELECT id, password, name, user_role, remark, created_id, created_dt, modified_id, modified_dt, user_status, phone_number, due_date, hospital, branch_code FROM tb_user where id=#{id} and user_status='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user(id, password, name, phone_number, due_date, user_role, created_id, created_dt, user_status, join_code, branch_code) VALUES ( #{id}, #{encoded_password}, #{name}, #{phone_number}, #{due_date}, 'USER', #{id}, now(), 'Y', #{join_code}, (select branch_code from tb_branch_mng where join_code = #{join_code}) )
